Wondrous item, common
This small charm resembles a human finger bone engraved with runes and complicated knotwork patterns. As you contemplate a specific course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes, you can use an action to snap the charm in half to gain the benefit of an @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.CnNNEgO2tpR1uMZ6]{augury} spell. Once used, the charm is destroyed.
